doc:
Thomas Dekker (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thomas_Dekker_(actor) 0 Thomas Alexander Dekker (born December 28, 1987) is an American film, television actor, musician, and voice actor. He is also a singer, and has written and produced two albums. He is best known for his roles as John Connor in Terminator: The Sarah Connor Chronicles, Adam Conant on The Secret Circle, and Zach on Heroes. Dekker did the voice of Littlefoot in The Land Before Time V-IX (singing voice in The Land Before Time V) and as Fievel Mousekewitz in An American Tail: The Treasure of Manhattan Island and An American Tail: The Mystery of the Night Monster. He is known for playing Jesse Braun in the 2010 remake of A Nightmare on Elm Street, and Smith in Gregg Araki's film Kaboom. Dekker starred as Gregory Valentine in the TV show Backstrom. Thomas_Alexander_Dekker ( born December_28_,_1987 ) is an_American_film , television_actor , musician , and voice_actor . He is also a_singer , and has_written_and_produced two_albums . He is_best_known for his_roles as John_Connor in Terminator : The_Sarah_Connor_Chronicles , Adam_Conant on The_Secret_Circle , and Zach on Heroes . Dekker did the_voice of Littlefoot in The_Land Before Time_V-IX_(_singing_voice in The_Land Before Time_V ) and as Fievel_Mousekewitz in An_American_Tail : The_Treasure of Manhattan_Island and An_American_Tail : The_Mystery of the_Night_Monster . He is_known for playing Jesse_Braun in the_2010_remake of A_Nightmare on Elm_Street , and Smith in Gregg_Araki 's_film_Kaboom . Dekker starred as Gregory_Valentine in the_TV_show_Backstrom .
